test.sql: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM EmployeeTerritories et WHERE et.EmployeeID > AVG(e.EmployeeID * et.EmployeeID) ) FROM Employees e

expectedError.text: Multiple columns are specified in aggregated expression '"e"."EmployeeID" * "et"."EmployeeID"' containing an outer reference. If an expression being aggregated contains an outer reference, then that outer reference must be the only column referenced in the expression.
